desc: Classroom and laboratory experiences in nursing and health assessment skills develop the student's ability to provide nursing care. Opportunities are provided to apply knowledge from the liberal arts and nursing theory to simulated patient care situations. Individual practice sessions in the nursing laboratory are expected. Performance testing determines readiness for the role of caregiver in a variety of clinical settings. Taken concurrently with Nursing 302, 304, 308. Offered annually in the fall semester.
notes: Students in Nursing 306 must also register for lab Nursing 306L. Open to Nursing majors only.
title: Health Assessment
